aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: I’m Senior Front-End Developer and FullStack Developer. Coding and Reading new technology is my daily routine.      Designing and creating new ideas and startup from zero hundred is one of my favorites. Teamwork skills, artistic works such as songwriting, music and poetry are among my other interests.

sections.title: Education
items: - Bachelor Degree of Civil Engineering from Azad University of KASHAN (2008-2013)

sections.title: Experiences
items: - Creates graphics designs for the different websites worldwide by Figma and Photoshop and familiar Illustrator
- Create and Develop any website and web app’s
- CIW teacher in Raad School and pv

- Develop Web Applications and Websites with Html5 & Css3 & Javascript & Jquery & Bootstrap4 & Vue Js & Nuxt Js & React Js & Next Js & Other Js Libs and Familiar with php & wordpress & Python & Django & Node Js & Express Js & Deno & Fresh & headless cms s like strapi , payloadcms ,etc...
- Responsive Design and Develop with any methods
